attributes.action: Get rid of the House of Lords
attributes.additional_details: Stop filling your personal pockets and understand you are voted into power by the uk people for the uk people. The uk people from walks others than the low life rallying in the streets are also fed up. Don’t treat good working people with contempt. Stop twisting information and put in place laws to prevent the media from publishing uncorroborated articles without a legitimate source.
attributes.background: There is no reason for the House of Lords. In this modern day people see that the House of Lords is surplus to parliaments needs and at times can create a conflict of interest. The uk people are fed up of the lords taking large sums of money for nothing. uk people will turn against all politicians

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555591
